name: Network N Ltd
overview:
Network N builds independent fan channels about the biggest entertainment franchises. The team are games media veterans with over 50 years combined experience.

The unique Network N platform combines original stories, with user generated submissions and aggregated, curated content from the rest of the web.

The first product from Network N launched in June 2012 - PCGamesN.com includes channels on franchises like Minecraft, League of Legends, World of Tanks, Call of Duty and more.

Editors are based both in the US and UK, delivering rolling news coverage

Clients so far include Alienware, NCSoft, Sega, Electronic Arts, Blizzard, Trion, 2K Games, Gameforge, Rebellion, Epic, Wargaming, Ubisoft, CCP, Bethesda, Square Enix, SimStop and Green Man Gaming.

Content namechecked and linked from hundreds of sites including Venturebeat, Polygon, MCV, PC Gamer, GameSpot and Gizmodo.
